answers.answer: Swelling and hemorrhoids. I just gave up on shaving. With all the hemorrhoids and cankles it's not like me and my fiance are intimate anyway. Oh yea and waking up in the middle of the night choking on burning stomach acid from the acid reflux. That's a good time.

Yes its so tough to keep of the shaving. The fact that I cannot bend, or get out of bed, being that my stomach is getting so big and hard! Its definitely a challenge for the most part. Uncomfortable! And im only 25 wks, UGGGHHH
Im 32 weeks and yes bending gets really hard, my stomach is so big is hard to shave, its getting hard to sleep with all the peeing amd leg crambs, and dealing with gestational diabetes, sooo tired!!
Sorry ladies you're going through everything , I forgot all about the peeing every hour or so and being emotional got so much worse trying to get over my baby's dad
Swelling on my feet ankles and calves, heartburn and acid reflux. Terrible headaches. Not being able to stand or walk alot without my feet hurting instantly. And contractions.

Oh shaving... Lol it will get much worse! After about 37 weeks EVERYTHING hurts! Hips, feet, legs, stomach, vaaag! And it all revolves around that time that baby could come anytime, and your just wishing and wishing that he/she would! Oh but it's all worh it :)
Lol I don't shave often but when I get the urge I want too but it's hard to reach , my hips and back hurt most of the time usually worse when I work
Yep shaving is hard to do anymore lol im 32 weeks and i nap like way too much i wish the nesting bug would kick me in the butt with a ball of energy! lol and those leg cramps
I got bit by the nesting bug but it wasn't hard enough lol , I haven't gotten the urge to clean anymore I just feel so tired now
Another bad thing is all these random stretch marks , my legs haven't gotten any bigger but I still got new stretch marks

question: I'm 33 weeks and now just noticing the worst part of pregnancy is not being able to shave as easy as I use too like I can still shave but I need to be sitting down and Braxton hicks kick in when I try to bend. What's the worst for you ladies ?
title: worst part of pregnancy
